{"id":419605043,"lang":"c","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1605201870,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/419605043/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"5.6 MB","code":"\n\nint myAtoi(char * str){\n  if (str == NULL)\n        return 0;\n    \n    int i = 0;\n    bool neg = false;\n      \n    char c = str[i];    \n    while (c != '\\0')\n    {\n        if (isdigit(c))\n            break;\n\n        char nextChar = str[i+1];\n        if (nextChar == '\\0')\n            return 0;\n        \n        else if (c == '.' && isdigit(nextChar))\n        {\n            return 0;\n        }\n        else if (c == '+' || c == '-')\n        {\n            if (!isdigit(nextChar))\n                return 0;\n            i++;\n            \n            if (c == '-')\n                neg = true;\n            \n            break;\n        }\n        else if (isalpha(c))\n            return 0;\n                \n        c = str[++i];\n    }\n    \n    int res = 0;\n    printf(\"i=%d c=%c\\n\", i, str[i]);\n    while(isdigit(str[i]))\n    {\n        int d = str[i] - '0';\n        \n        if (neg)\n            d = -d;\n        \n        if (res > INT_MAX/10 || (res == INT_MAX/10 && d > 7))\n            return INT_MAX;\n        \n        if (res < INT_MIN/10 || (res == INT_MIN/10 && d < -8))\n            return INT_MIN;\n        \n        res = res*10 + d;\n        \n        i++;\n    }\n    \n    return res;\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi"}
